system.description:
You have been granted the possibility to manipulate the forces of chaos, and bend it to your will to better your odds.

When rolling for an ability check, an attack, or a saving throw, you can replace any d20 with 2d10 instead. Roll the 2d10, sum them up, and use the result as you would use normally from a d20.

You must declare using this feature before rolling for your ability check, your attack or your saving throw. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus. You regain all expended uses on a long rest.
system.prerequisite: Level 1 Warlock Agent of the Magus
